name: ion-exchanger production for water treatment | ion-exchanger for water treatment | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8521/documentation

Data for infrastructure based on weak data and various assumtions. Therfore process has a large uncertainty for the equipment used.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



strong acidic cation and strong base anion resin, material used for plant, transport of materials , land use of pant, no menergy for the manufacturing included.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/422:Construction of utility projects/4220:Construction of utility projects

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Time of literature publication. Measurements took place partly before this period.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Raw water data from Switzerland (design calculations).
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Plant with a production of  100 m3/h. Two-bed system with a strong acidic cation resin volume of 5.3 m3 and a strong base anion resin volume of 2.8 m3. Unit is operated with counterflow regeneration, a defgasser and without lime decarbonation. Life time of the unit 15 y and of the resin 5 y. 7500 h/a operating time. Tank material stainless steel, lining PP.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: none This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography CH. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data for resin volume based on design calculations for the specified water quality. Material demand estimated based on very weak data (one source). Land use estimated from literature data (one source). Standard distances used for transports.

exchanges.description:
EcoSpold01Location=CH
Uncertainty not applicable for output
